title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.6 - Financing of planning costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.6 - Financing of planning costs

State Regulations
DWSRF assistance may be provided for project planning costs
prior to completion of that planning. Planning costs may also be included as
allowable costs for purposes of DWSRF assistance for any subsequent portion of
the project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2604.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
